name: Department of State
description: The Department of State leads America's foreign policy through diplomacy, advocacy, and assistance by advancing the interests of the American people, their safety and economic prosperity.

painPoints.point: Diplomatic security and IT systems modernization for embassy and consulate operations worldwide
Passport and visa processing system improvements to reduce wait times and handle increased demand
Cybersecurity and data protection critical for sensitive diplomatic communications and information
Global IT infrastructure modernization for worldwide embassy network
Foreign service management and human resources system improvements
IT acquisition and management challenges including project delays, budget overruns, and need for improved oversight and mature acquisition practices affecting global embassy IT infrastructure
painPoints.source: GAO High-Risk List 2025 - Improving IT Acquisitions and Management

strategicPriorities.priority: Passport and Visa Processing System Improvements
Embassy and Consulate IT Systems Modernization

primary: Department of State Budget Justification FY2025 - https://www.state.gov/budget-performance
secondary: GAO Reports on Department of State IT Modernization

evaluationFactors: Past performance with government or international systems

keyOffices: Office of Small and Disadvantaged Business Utilization (OSDBU)
insights: Global IT infrastructure modernization is major focus for worldwide embassy network
Passport and visa processing system improvements are high priority
Cybersecurity is critical due to sensitive diplomatic communications
Construction and facilities management for embassies is significant
Large-scale system integration expertise highly valued
